Description: A string of twenty-four brown and white shell cylindrical disc beads of uniform size.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Mostagedda, Grave 201 Found in a child's burial
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton, ‘Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture’ (London, 1937), pl. XXXIX, 86F17; Grave register, pl. VII.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (26)
Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (pl.XXXIX,86 F17)
